alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MOBILE AND WEST CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 AM CST... At 800 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilmer, or 14 miles northwest of Midtown Mobile, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Saraland, Bay Minette, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, Chunchula, Stockton, Stapleton, Axis, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I65 And AL 225, and I65 And AL 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
